reviews.sentence: Never again. Short on staff left waiting for breakfast as one staff member seemed to be the only one on duty no clean tables in food area no cups or plates never has a service hotel been so shabby for a four star never again will my company send staff to stay again as service was not even to a one star holiday in iran.

Weekend away. My partner was born in Liverpool and has not been back for many years. We can only say that these apartments are superb. They are modern comfortable and everything you need is there. Spotlessly clean in all areas and a very good selection at the self service breakfast. There is only one thing I would like to see changed and its the cutlery in the breakfast area which is not up to the high standard of everything else. They certainly wo nt be worried about it being taken. The regeneration has been tastefully done and offers plenty to do and many excellent restaurants within walking distance. Will defiantly return next trip to Liverpool.

Fabulous Hotel. We stayed at this hotel for the bank holiday Monday celebrations of the 3 Queens. My mum uses a wheelchair and the staff on reception were absolutely brilliant in ensuring that everything was fight for our stay. This is the second time I have stayed here and it will definatley not be the last. A great big thank you for Dani Kamil and Johnathan.

Nice Suite in Liverpool. We liked having a suite and it was great having access to the laundry facilities. Good location for Albert Dock attractions. The front counter staff could have been more helpful and in fact the young men seemed indifferent. For instance we missed breakfast on Tuesday because they did not tell us Monday breakfast was weekend hours due to the Bank Holiday. They also had us very confused about where we were supposed to park. The young lady in the evening was much more helpful.
Exceptional. Excellent location for the Horse Show. Clean rooms and friendly attentive staff. We could not fault itNothing bad about our trip.

Back Home Again. i am from Phoenix Arizona but feel like I have come home after checking in at Staybridge Suites Liverpool. So happy to be back here. I strayed on my last trip and stayed at a different hotel but lesson learned and I will never do that again. Was great to see Adam at the front desk and great to sit in lobby and just chill with my co workers. LOVE THIS HOTEL and LOVE THE EMPLOYEES.

Great location. Lovely room and great location. However only two things negative to say. Air conditioning vents very close to our window. If we opened the window for fresh air the noise was annoying. Breakfast was mad. Think everyone arrived at a similar time so the hot food was gone and when new hashbrowns and bacon arrived they looked undercoked. However we enjoyed our stay and would recommend for familys.

Their friendly and welcoming staff and flexibility made a dificu. We stayed at the Staybridge Suites in Liverpool while sorting out family issues. Although we originally intended to stay for two nights we ended up staying for six nights. The Staybridges location is perfect for a stay in Liverpool. We had a lovely peaceful studio suite. The brekies were good as always and the evening wine and cheese socialising events were fun. We really appreciated the friendly and welcoming staff and their willingness to be flexible regarding the dates that we stayed. Their attitude more than anything else made a difficult family situation bearable allowing us to relax at the end of difficult days. We extended our stay twice the final time because we wanted a day of relaxation on the beach at New Brighton and we knew there was no better place to stay. Thank you Staybridge.

Long time IHG member and stayed in a number of the partner hotels in the group but first time in a Staybridge Liverpol. wow. Fantastic rooms love the kitchenette but very luxurious all round. great location great staff thoroughly recommended.

it is was hard to find at first and my family and I could not even get our breakfast and there is only 1 elevator for 5 floors and the room was too small and inconvenient. I will stay somewhere else next time.

Classy comfortable kind and memorable. Staff are fantastic. Wonderful. The room was perfect bed super comfy great with fab views of the city and dock at night. The staff were AMAZING made my birthday trip special. a truly friendly team kind and considerate to a degree that is rare even in this friendly city. Remember the names of Dani and Dany Guilio. and the lovely young lady who gave me kind support over a tooth issue. Even noted my birthday and gave me a bottle of wine. Great bunch of people. The social a kind of happy hour with class was a cut above anything I have come across in Liverpool. Can not wait to return.

A great overnight stay. Just one night in Liverpool for a football match we found the Staybridge Suite at a reasonable price we had stayed with this group previously in the US and had been very happy. The Liverpool apartments did not disappoint. We were given a corner apartment which was spacious comfortable clean and with a wonderful view from the corner window. Reception staff were exceptional friendly and personable and breakfast certainly exceeded our expectation we fully recommend this company.

Superb. We were a family group staying for a few nights in a one bedroom suite and in a studio suite. From the moment we checked in we knew we were in for a lovely stay. All the staff here from housekeepers to breakfast staff and receptionists were most helpful courteous and friendly. Really well appointed rooms with excellent kitchen facilities. Suggest you go for the one bedroom suite if you want a separate sitting area. Breakfast was plentiful and the snacks and drinks provided on some weekday evenings were a nice touch. Excellent location for all the relevant Liverpool sights and parking is very close by if the hotel ’s own car park happens to be full. Highly recommended.

Excellent Apartments. Stayed here last Friday excellent value for money was priced similar to Crown plaza and holiday in but was far superior plus full facilities to make it feel like a home from home. Only problem with room 101 was it was directly above the roller shutter for the carpark every time a car entered you could hear the mechanism working which was irritating. also directly across the road were flats which decided to have a party all night long windows could be better sound proofed not really any reflection of the hotel apartment itself but worth noting. Would definitely stay here again just avoid room 101 or that end of the building.

Business trip to conference at ACC you could not stay closer than this. and in comfort. This has the feel of a home away from home with a kitchen that feels like home where you help yourself to breakfast and coffee or sparkling water on tap 247. The rooms are spacious with a small kitchenette the showers are strong and hot the beds firm but fluffy for a good nights sleep. Tough to fault really lovely Albert docks next door. Definitely recommend if you are in town esp going to the ACC or a concert there.

Fabulous bank holiday weekend. Just returned from these suites after spending a couple of nights there over the bank holiday weekend. They are ideally placed close to all the attractions Liverpool has to offer. Suites are huge and have everything you need also lovely and clean. Buffet breakfast is included in the price and 24 hour tea and coffee. My only complaint was that on weekends they do not start serving breakfast until 8 am so missed it on our last day as we had an early checkout. Staff are extremely helpful and can not do enough for you. We needed a taxi to Anfield and they had one there within 5 minutes for us. If I had to nitpick my only criticism would be that the sofa bed was slightly uncomfortable and the rooms are not cleaned on weekends but like I said that is just nitpicking. All in all would definitely recommend.

I would have given it a 5star but the Air conditioning system was not work 3 days. They kept resetting and it still was not working. In the 3rd day it turns out they never switched it from heating to cooling including their engineer. We suffered each night because it was so hot I felt sorry for my lil baby. Also we booked in advance and was supposed to have a discount for booking in advance but when got there they never applied any discount and we were told to write some kind of letter. I was a bit disappointed. Like I said it should have been a 5 star as customer service was good and it is excellent for family.
Perfect venue for a romantic getaway. Breakfast nice staff lovely very clean and moderncanot complain really. v good.
I would definitely stay again and recommend to family and friends. Everything. Fab apartment staff very friendly. Location was brilliant so central. Nothing.

Great Place to Stay in Liverpool. Booked 2 suites for a family of 5 and one of the bedrooms had a wonderful view of the ferries wheel at the docks. Suites were spacious with a separate bedroom and a living room cum small kitchen with a dining table. There is a couch in the living room which doubles up as a sofa bed which was adequate for my 10 year old kid. Breakfast was included and the spread quite substantial for a free breakfast. Lobby is on the first floor where breakfast is also served. There is a secured car park attached to the hotel at street level however the lots are n’t the largest and it cost 14 pounds per night. Location of the hotel is right next to Albert docks which is great as there are lots of eateries. Anfield Road is about a 10 to 15 minute leisurely drive away. Overall this is a great place to stay in Liverpool.
